h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Snow Fox Brush Location
content: Approach as the fox form and defeat him. Once defeated, grab his spirit and then return to the Forest of Felicity in the Valley of Ecstasy. Interact with the fox that is now here to get the Curios item.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Brush.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Brush', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Snow Fox Brush Location'.
The content is as follows:
Approach as the fox form and defeat him. Once defeated, grab his spirit and then return to the Forest of Felicity in the Valley of Ecstasy. Interact with the fox that is now here to get the Curios item.
